name: Popovers Stuffed

Stuffing: As desired – Spices: Rosemary, Thyme, Onion Powder; recommend 1 tsp of each

instructions: Make https://toleiko.ca/recipes/recipe.html?recipe=popovers, while they are cooking do the rest
Caramelize onions and mushrooms in a large pan
Add garlic, Rosemary and thyme to taste
Crush the nuts and add to onions and mushrooms
Continue to cook on low until popovers and gravy are done
Once the popovers are done, allow the too cool slightly
Fill the popovers with the onion mixture
Add slices of brie on top and return to the oven until the brie melts
Top with a heaping teaspoon of the chutney mixture, and your choice of either the horseradish or red pepper jelly
